attributes.action: Legislate 'primary' registration-plates be linked to Blue Badge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Blue Badge holders typically have access to a 'main' vehicle [they drive or use every-day] with a number of alternatives.

Keeping a record of these on a secure-server affords a simple exception-reporting online-check for enforcement; police, traffic-wardens may easily-check if a given vehicle registration-plate is paired with a given Blue-Badge. Not unlike existing Number Plate Recognition this secure-server database will save time & aid enforcement.

If a match is NOT found the registered-keeper of vehicle in question is available online too.

Police, traffic-warden... are suitably prepared to challenge.
